'''Vorryl Farwalker''' was a well-traveled [[drow]] [[adventurer]] for hire from the city of [[Neverwinter]], active in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: By the late 15{{th}} century DR, Vorryl Farwalker was considered to be one of the most well-traveled adventurers in all [[Faer√ªn]] and an excellent [[sword]]fighter. Eventually Vorryl reached the city of Neverwinter and began entertaining thoughts of settling down. During that time, he made a living by being an adventurer for hire and procurer of various items and resources.
